content: 16 sts put stitch marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 3 repeat *1sc 2sc increase * 8 times total 24 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 4 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc increase * 6 times total 30 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 5 back loop only blo make 1 single_crochet in each stitch around total 30 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 6 repeat *1sc* 13 times then decrease once repeat *1sc* 13 times then decrease last total 28 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 7 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc decrease*2 times total 26 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 8 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc decrease*2 times total 24 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 9 repeat * 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc decrease*2 times total 22 sts move marker slip_stitch & chain 1 round 10 repeat * 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc decrease*2 times total 20 sts slip stitch and fasten_off with long tail to sew the head on top of body attach pink yarn from the round 5 and front loop only flo chain 1 repeat *1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 2sc in next stitch increase * 6 times total 36 sts slip_stitch chain1 repeat *1sc 2hdc 1hdc* 12 times total 48 sts slip_stitch fasten_off and hide the remaining yarn hands… white yarn round 1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet or/ chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in the first chain round 2~6 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc total 6 sts and fasten_off at the last round with long tail to sew to side of body feet… white yarn round 1 magic_ring of 6 single_crochet or/ chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in the first chain round 2 1sc 1sc 2sc increase 1sc 1sc 2sc increase total 8 sts round 3~6 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc total 8 sts and fasten_off at the last round with long tail to sew to bottom as feet pink bow… pink yarn chain 6+1… follow the chart below to make the bow then use the remaining tail to tie in the middle to make the bow then sew to the head round 1 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 4 single_crochet in next chain then 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc 3 single_crochet last slip_stitch and chain 1 round 2 increase 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc increase increase increase increase 1sc 1sc 1sc 1sc increase increase increase slip_stitch and fasten_off with long tail to sew to head ears make 2 round 1 with white yarn magic_ring with 6 single_crochet stitches /or chain 2 then make 8 single_crochet in the first chain then slip_stitch to make a circle chain 1 round 2 repeat * 1sc increase * 3 times total stitches now is 9 sts continues rounds round 3 repeat *1sc 1sc increase * 3
